alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; Lafayette; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 12:04AM CST until January 17 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 above zero. * WHERE...Portions of central, south central and southwest Louisiana. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM CST this morning. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Avoyelles; Evangeline; Lafayette; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin; Upper Vermilion
